overview: Dobaaraâ€™, a Hindi feature film starring Manav Kaul and Parvathy Omanakuttan. The film is directed by Bejoy Nambiar of Shaitan and Wazir fame. The story revolves around Parvathy, a free-spirited girl, whose parents force her to get married. She marries Mohan and the couple move to a new city. While Mohan gets busy with work, Parvathy looks after the family. Twenty years after marriage, when their son graduates, Parvathy decides to take a drastic step.
title: Doobaara
